nodes.text: Perimako Major was a world where the Alliance to Restore the Republic fought against the Galactic Empire between 2 BBY and 3 ABY. Wedge Antilles and Derek Klivian, former Imperial cadets who had defected to become starfighter pilots in the Rebellion, were present during the battle at Perimako Major.
Perimako Major was mentioned in the short story "Rendezvous Point," written by Jason Fry and published in From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back in 2020.
